channel.description: Recent content in poster on From Now On

item.title: Present My SIGCOMM Poster in a Hubs VR Room
item.description: 2020 is an amazing year when we experienced many many “first times”. Good news and bad news. First time, my first-author poster COC: Hierarchical Coflow Ordering for WAN Bandwidth Optimization in Inter-Data Center was accepted by SIGCOMM. First time, I participated SRC (Student Research Competition) in SIGCOMM. First time, I presented a poster in a Hubs VR room. Yes, SIGCOMM poster/demo committee decided to use Mozilla Hubs to present each poster/demo online this year.
